title-group.article-title: The rhetorical structure of Luke 12 in its wider context

permissions.copyright-statement: COPYRIGHT C 1988 THE NEW TESTAMENT SOCIETY OF SOUTH AFRICA (NTSSA)

abstract.p: The study of the wider context of the rhetorical structure (as distinct from discrete rhetorical features) is proposed to apply to two areas: (1) the story and discourse, or signified and signifier, which concerns all matters in, and of, the text; and (2) the materiality of reading which concerns all matters presumably outside the text The polarity between text and textuality is explored at length in the five most important relations in which rhetorical features figure importantly.
